audioText: Vous resterez bêtement avec ce cheveu clair demain.
question: What will happen tomorrow?
options: You will stupidly stay with this light hair
You will wisely change your hair color
You will definitely cut your hair
You will probably dye your hair
explanation: The text states 'Vous resterez bêtement avec ce cheveu clair demain' - You will stupidly stay with this light hair tomorrow. 'Resterez' is the future form of 'rester' (to stay), and 'bêtement' means 'stupidly'.
